stories.original_headline: The secret to human intelligence? It might be in our gut
stories.original_summary: New research shows gut bacteria can directly influence how the brain develops and functions. When scientists transferred microbes from different primates into mice, the animals’ brains began to resemble those of the original host species. Microbes from large-brained primates boosted brain energy and
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Gut Sprites Spark Wisdom in Minds!
stories.fantasy_story: Wise Alchemists have uncovered a grand secret within our bellies! Tiny, unseen sprites residing in one's gut can shape how the mind grows and thinks. When these sprites from intelligent forest creatures were shared with small critters, their brains began to mimic the clever beasts, boosting their mental vigor.

stories.original_summary: Garmin announced that it's adding nutrition tracking to the Garmin Connect app as a perk for users with a Garmin Connect Plus subscription. The feature lets users "track their calories and macros (proteins, fats and carbs) and receive Active Intelligence insights to help them achieve their nutrition
stories.fantasy_headline: Cartographers' Guild Enchantment Tracks Daily Fare for Health!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Cartographers' Guild of Garmin has unveiled a new enchantment! Users of their magical parchments can now track their daily fare, counting vital essences like proteins and fats. With a special master key, they receive whispers of wisdom to guide them toward peak health and strength.

stories.original_headline: Asus ROG’s next ally is Xreal, with 240Hz AR glasses coming in 2026
stories.original_summary: Xreal is having a big CES. It announced its new 1S AR glasses and the Switch 2-ready Neo dock that's also a battery - both of which are already available to buy. It's not done with the announcements yet, as it delivered a peek at an upcoming partnership with Asus that will yield a new […]
stories.fantasy_headline: House of ROG Joins Xreal for New Scrying Lenses!
stories.fantasy_story: The Arcane crafters of Xreal have forged a mighty alliance with the revered House of ROG! Together, they promise a new marvel: enchanted scrying lenses that will reveal hidden wonders. Xreal has also unveiled a powerful new dock, acting as a power crystal, for the realm's popular gaming artifact, the 'Switch'.
